channel.title: Swiftui on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Swiftui on Joost Plattel

item.title: Writing SwiftUI apps With Chat-GPT
item.description:
ChatGPT is all the rage nowadays. Personally I’ve used it quite a few times and professionally as a software developer it’s interesting to use. I don’t fear for my job/knowledge (yet!) as it’s mostly integrations and not of the shelf code… (I haven’t tried the hardware space in Chat GPT yet….. paperclips might be optimized..) ✌️

To figure out how useful it might be for me, I embarked on a journey together with ChatGPT to build a piece of software that would solve issues that I’d had with the Mac OS X Finder for a while. The shortcomings of Finder can be summed up with:

item.title: Finder Favorites
item.description: A simple app that let’s you group column views of favorite folders
